```{r setup, include = F}
library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)

knitr::knit_hooks$set(time = local({
  now <- NULL
  function(before, options) {
    if (before) {
      # record the current time before each chunk
      now <<- Sys.time()
    } else {
      # calculate the time difference after a chunk
      res <- difftime(Sys.time(), now, units = 's')
      # return a character string to show the time
      diff_time <- format(as.POSIXct(as.numeric(res), 
                                     origin = '1970-01-01', tz = 'UTC'), "%Mmin %Ssec")
      paste("Chunk execution time = ", diff_time)
    }
  }
}))

rm(list = ls())

opts_chunk$set(echo = T, message = F, warning = F,
               fig.width = 10,
               fig.asp = 0.8,
               out.width = "100%")

require(SAEM4JLS)
require(tictoc)
```



```{r}
# Exemple d'optimalité entre les 3 fct MH, MH_high_dim et MH_high_dim_para sur le modèle non lineaire mixte
m <- function(t, phi1, phi2, phi3) (phi1  )/(1+exp((phi2-t)/phi3))
#=======================================#
param <- list(sigma2 = .05^2,
              #rho2 = 5,
              mu = c(0.9,90,5),
              omega2 = c(0.005, 40, 1),
              #S.data data,
              a = 90,
              b = 30,
              alpha = 0.5,
              beta = 10)

#=======================================#
t <- seq(60,120, length.out = 10) #time values
set.seed(123)

G <- 40 ; ng = 4
link = function(t,phi1, phi2, phi3) phi2#/phi3

dt <- create_JLS_HD_data(G, ng, t, m, link, param)

var.true <- dt$var.true 
S.data <- dt$survival
U <- dt$U

Y <- do.call(get_obs, var.true) + rnorm(n, 0, sqrt(param$sigma2))
S.data.time <- S.data$obs
S.data.time.log.sum <- sum(log(S.data.time))
```

```{r data ploting, echo = F}
longitudinal_plot <- data.frame(time, Y, id = rep(1:N, each = length(t)), gen = rep(1:G, each = ng*length(t)) ) %>%
  ggplot(aes(time, Y, col = factor(gen), group = factor(id) )) +
  geom_point() + geom_line() +
  theme(legend.position = 'null')

S.data_plot <- S.data %>% ggplot(aes(obs, fill = factor(U))) +
    geom_histogram(col = 'white', position = 'identity', bins = 30) + theme(legend.position = 'null')

grid.arrange(longitudinal_plot, S.data_plot, nrow = 2)
```

```{r, echo = F}
sigma2_a <- sigma2_b <- 0.1

zeta <- function(alpha, beta, phi1, phi2, phi3, a,b)
{
  integral <- S.data$obs^b/b
  
  lbd <- function(t,g) exp(alpha*link(t, phi1[g], phi2[g], phi3[g]))
  P1 <- integral * sapply(1:nrow(S.data),
                    function(i) lbd(S.data$obs[i], S.data$gen[i]) )
  
  P2 <- exp(beta%*%t(U))
  
  beta*sum(U) -  b*a^-b * sum(P2*P1)
}

zeta.A <- function(alpha, beta, phi1, phi2, phi3, a,b)zeta(alpha, beta, phi1, phi2, phi3, a,b)
zeta.B <- function(beta, alpha, phi1, phi2, phi3, a,b)zeta(alpha, beta, phi1, phi2, phi3, a,b)

zeta.der.A <- function(alpha, k, beta, phi1, phi2, phi3, a, b)
{
  link.fct <- function(t,g) link(t, phi1[g], phi2[g], phi3[g])
  link.value <- sapply(1:nrow(S.data), function(i) link.fct(S.data$obs[i], S.data$gen[i]) )
  
  
  P1 <- exp(beta%*%t(U))
  
  print(P1)
  P2 <- sapply(1:nrow(S.data), 
               function(i)integrate(
                 function(t) t^(b-1)*exp(alpha*link.fct(t, S.data$gen[i])) *link.fct(t, S.data$gen[i]),
                 0, S.data$obs[i])$value
               )
  
  print(sum(link.value))
  sum(link.value) - b*a^-b*sum(P1*P2)
}


res <- SPGD(2, theta0 = 0,
      step = 1e-1,
      zeta.der.A, 1, zeta.A, 
      param$beta,  Z$phi1, Z$phi2, Z$phi3, Z$a,Z$b, verbatim = T)



zeta.der.B <- function(beta, k, alpha, phi1, phi2, phi3, a, b)
{
  link.fct <- function(t,g) link(t, phi1[g], phi2[g], phi3[g])
  link.value <- sapply(1:nrow(S.data), function(i) link.fct(S.data$obs[i], S.data$gen[i]) )
  
  P1 <- S.data$U*exp(beta*S.data$U)
  P2 <- sapply(1:nrow(S.data), 
               function(i)integrate(
                 function(t) t^(b-1)*exp(alpha*link.fct(t, S.data$gen[i])),
                 0, S.data$obs[i])$value
               )
  
  sum(link.value) - b*a^-b*sum(P1*P2)
}

h <- fct_vector(function(a,b, ...) N*log(b*a^-b),
                function(b, ...) (b-1)*S.data.time.log.sum
                # function(phi1, phi2, phi3, ...) sum(link(S.data.time, rep(phi1, ng), rep(phi2, ng), rep(phi3, ng) )) 
                )






as.numeric(res)

plot(attr(res, 'f.value'))
plot(attr(res, 'gradf.value'))
plot(attr(res, 'theta.value'))

zeta.A(0.1, param$beta,  Z$phi1, Z$phi2, Z$phi3, Z$a,Z$b)


l
```

```{r}
model <- SAEM_model( 
  function(sigma2, ...) -n/(2*sigma2),
  function(phi1, phi2, phi3, ...) mean((Y - get_obs(phi1, phi2, phi3) )^2 ), 'sigma2',
  
  # === Variable Latente === #
  latent_vars = list(
    # === Non linear model === #
    latent_variable('phi', dim = G, size = 3, prior = list(mean = 'mu', variance = 'omega2'),
                    add_on = c('zeta(phi1 = phi1, phi2 = phi2, phi3 = phi3, ...)' )),
    
    # === S.data model === #
    latent_variable('a', prior = list(mean = 'a', variance.hyper = 'sigma2_a'),
                    add_on = c('zeta(a = a, ...) +',
                               'h$eval(a = a, ..., i = 1)')),
    latent_variable('b', prior = list(mean = 'b', variance.hyper = 'sigma2_b'),
                    add_on = c('zeta(b = b, ...) +',
                               'sum(h$eval(b = b, ..., i = c(1,2)))' ))
    # latent_variable('alpha', prior = list(mean = 'alpha', variance.hyper = 'sigma2_alpha'),
    #                 add_on = c('zeta(alpha = alpha, ...) +',
    #                            'alpha*h$eval(..., i = 4)'))
  ),

  # === Paramètre de regression === #
  regression.parameter = list(
    regression_parameter('alpha', 1, function(...) SPGD(1, theta0 = alpha,
                                                      step = 1e-2,
                                                      zeta.der.A, n, zeta.A, 
                                                      parameter$beta,  Z$phi1, Z$phi2, Z$phi3, Z$a,Z$b) ),
    
    regression_parameter('beta', 1, function(...) SPGD(1, theta0 = beta,
                                                      step = 1e-2,
                                                      zeta.der.B, n, zeta.B, 
                                                      res$alpha,  Z$phi1, Z$phi2, Z$phi3, Z$a,Z$b) )
  )
)
```

```{r saem}
# ---  Initialisation des paramètres --- #
param0 <- param %>% sapply(function(x) x* runif(1, 1.1,1.4))
#param0$rho2 = 0.2 ; param0$omega2 <- rep(.1,3)
param0$sigma2 <- 1
#===============================================#
load.SAEM(model)
var0 <- init.SAEM(model, 
                  x0 = list(phi = c(1,80,4), 
                            a = param0$a, b = param0$b), 
                  sd = list(phi = c(.05, 1.5, .5),
                            a = 2, b = 2) )
#===================================================================================#
oracle <- max(do.call(S$eval, var.true), param, var.true)
oracle %>% unlist
```
# saem
```{r saem}
exclude.sim = c('a', 'b', 'alpha') ; exclude.max = c()
load.SAEM(model, exclude.sim, exclude.max)
var1 <- var0
var1[c(exclude.sim)] <- var.true[c(exclude.sim)]
param0[exclude.max] <- param[exclude.max]


sim(100, var1, Phi, param, 3) %>% plot(nrow = 2)

res <- SAEM(100, 5, param0, var1, Phi, S$eval, max, sim,  eps = 1e-3,
            burnin = 50, 
            adptative.sd = 0.6, verbatim = 3 )

```

```{r plot, echo = F, fig.asp=0.8, fig.width=8}
plot(res, true.value = oracle )
plot(res, true.value = oracle, var = 'summary', time = F )
```
